EmailTemplate.name: NA_Tier2_Enterprise_Warm_EB.NA_Tier3_Enterprise_Cold_EB_Nurture_Email5
EmailTemplate.subject: 4 on-demand webinars from Turbonomic for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We recently curated our four most popular webinars and are now happy to present them to you on-demand for your viewing pleasure. Introducing Turbonomic 6.0
<[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-live-6_0-release/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=on-demand_webinars]]>
Get the full details on the improvements and new features delivered with our latest release, Turbonomic 6.0.
Self-Managing OpenShift with Turbonomic
<[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbn-self-managing-openshift-turbonomic/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=on-demand_webinars]]>
Learn how Turbonomic automates key operations including re-scheduling, horizontal scaling, and end-to-end visibility and control of your total environment.
3 Ways to Cut Your AWS Bill by 30%
<[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbn-turbonomic-aws-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=on-demand_webinars]]>
Learn 3 ways that Turbonomic helps customers, today, reduce their AWS costs by 30% (or more) through self-managing cloud operations.
Spectre & Meltdown - From Security Risk to Application Performance Risk
<[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbn-meltdown-spectre/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=on-demand_webinars]]>
Learn why Spectre and Meltdown patches often show significant and unpredictable application performance impacts and how Turbonomic can help.
Each month we will present a new, live webinar aimed at helping IT professionals optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time. Be sure to check our website <[[https://www.turbonomic.com/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=on-demand_webinars]]> to learn about upcoming webinar topics.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
